mapper.update: update pet set category_id = #{category_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Pet_name = #{pet_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Pet_photoUrls = #{pet_photoUrls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tag_id = #{tag_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where Pet_id = #{pet_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select Pet_id, category_id, Pet_name, Pet_photoUrls, tag_id, status from pet
